item.title: Rules
FAQ
item.description: Why I was been banned/kicked/muted? Most likely, you violated Discord guidelines или our Discord rules. How I can be unbanned? You might argue the ban or prove there is no violation with ZwerOxotnik#7117 on Discord. Is there another option for removing the penalty for a violation? There is a one, you must prepare and tell an informative lecture to our community on the ZwerOxotnik’s UC server without violations. Again, first, contact with ZwerOxotnik#7117 on Discord and your apply will be subjectively reviewed.

item.title: Commissions
item.description: You probably expect something like this https://kiliankuro.carrd.co/, however, currently everything is individual, contact through Discord:ZwerOxotnik#7117 or zweroxotnik@gmail.com, if you want more privacy, please contact me through matrix: https://matrix.to/#/@zweroxotnik:matrix.org. More on the previous page (You’ll find out details about types of my drawings, stylistics, examples, etc. there).
